content:
As an AI language model, I don't have up-to-date information related to the current tuition fees at Cardiff University. However, I can provide general information on how the tuition cost differs for different programs based on past data.

The tuition cost for each program at Cardiff University can vary depending on the level of the program, the type of degree, and the subject area. Generally, undergraduate courses cost less than postgraduate courses. Within each category, the cost can vary according to the type of degree and the subject field. 

For instance, undergraduate courses in arts, humanities, and social sciences are usually cheaper than courses in science, engineering, and business. Similarly, postgraduate courses in arts, humanities, and social sciences may cost less than postgraduate courses in science, engineering, and business.

It is necessary to keep in mind that tuition fees may also vary according to the student's nationality, as international students may pay higher fees than local students. Additionally, the tuition cost may also differ from year to year.

To get accurate and relevant information on tuition fees for specific programs at Cardiff University, it’s better to consult the university's official website or contact their admission office.
